input: Initiate a batch request to retrieve all active loan contract prolongation requests including their change state IDs.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractProlongationRequests?$filter=LifeCycleStatusCode eq '3'&$select=ChangeStateID HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
